summary: Completed comprehensive testing of category-based tax exemption feature. All backend APIs and frontend UI components are working correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns status 200 instead of 201 for successful creation

passed_tests: Sales API calculates tax only on non-exempt items
Settings page shows category exemption checkboxes
Clicking category toggles its exemption status
Sales page shows 'Taxable Amount' when exemptions exist
Backend correctly looks up item type and excludes exempt categories from tax
Tax calculation integration between frontend and backend
Category exemption UI displays TAX EXEMPT badges correctly
